ITC_KEYBOARD::CUSBkeys::usbKeyStruct

ITC_KEYBOARD::CUSBkeys::CUSBkeys::usbKeyStruct Struct Reference

The usbKeyStruct holds all information about an USB HID hardware key. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

byte bHID
CUsbKeyTypes.HWkeys bScanKey
CUsbKeyTypes.usbFlagsHigh bFlagHigh
CUsbKeyTypes.usbFlagsMid bFlagMid
CUsbKeyTypes.usbFlagsLow bFlagLow
byte bIntScan

Detailed Description

The members bHID, bScanKey, bFlagHigh, bFlagMid, bFlagLow and bIntScan build the complete description of the key mapping of an USB hardware key identified by bScanKey
